title: Broccoli and ginger beef stir fry
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons plain flour', '300g (11 oz) beef stock', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '450g (16 oz) frying steak, cut into strips', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh ginger root', '1 clove garlic, minced', '350g (12 oz) chopped fresh broccoli']
